str2: Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From apo and the base of basis; literally, to disembark; figuratively, to eventuate.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
A coal-fire, a heap of burning coals. From anthrax; a bed of burning coals.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: To lie, recline, be placed, be laid, set, specially appointed, destined. Middle voice of a primary verb; to lie outstretched.
A little fish. Neuter of a presumed derivative of the base of optos; a relish to other food, i.e., fish.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: From epi and keimai; to rest upon.
Bread, a loaf, food. From airo; bread or a loaf.
